title: Voice Bank Africa
description: A comprehensive voice banking platform for African languages, enabling voice data collection, processing, and synthesis. Built to preserve and digitize African linguistic heritage through modern AI technology.

title: Smart Queue Triage System
description: An intelligent queue management system that optimizes patient flow in healthcare facilities. Features real-time triage, priority scheduling, and analytics dashboard for improved healthcare delivery.

title: Spaza Easy Pay
description: A digital payment solution designed for South African spaza shops, enabling seamless transactions, inventory management, and customer loyalty programs for small local businesses.
